title: Installation issue: vtk - 'vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester' was not declared in this scope
body:
I am encountering some odd errors like
.../spack-src/Rendering/FreeType/vtkFreeTypeTools.cxx:1251:26: error: 'vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester' was not declared in this scope

when attempting to compile vtk with freetype@2.10.4 as a dependency.

In a web search of the error message, I encountered https://gitlab.kitware.com/vtk/vtk/-/issues/18033
which seems to match the situation I  am experiencing, and claims the issue is due to freetype@2.10.3: no longer exporting FT_CALLBACK_DEF.  The commentor provided patches to either:

1. update the vtk code to not use FT_CALLBACK_DEF, --or--
2. define FT_CALLBACK_DEF in vtk

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install  vtk@8.1.2%gcc +ffmpeg+ipo+mpi+opengl2~osmesa+python+qt+xdmf build_type=RelWithDebInfo ^freetype@2.10.4
...
/lustre/jn10/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-vtk-8.1.2-d72ko7o34eumc5di5tk37h3btbxkqfr5/spack-src/Rendering/FreeType/vtkFreeTypeTools.cxx:390:1: error: expected constructor, destructor, or type conversion before 'vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester'
 vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester(FTC_FaceID face_id,
 ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/lustre/jn10/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-vtk-8.1.2-d72ko7o34eumc5di5tk37h3btbxkqfr5/spack-src/Rendering/FreeType/vtkFreeTypeTools.cxx: In member function 'virtual FT_Error vtkFreeTypeTools::CreateFTCManager()':
/lustre/jn10/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-vtk-8.1.2-d72ko7o34eumc5di5tk37h3btbxkqfr5/spack-src/Rendering/FreeType/vtkFreeTypeTools.cxx:1251:26: error: 'vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester' was not declared in this scope
                          vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester,
                          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/lustre/jn10/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-vtk-8.1.2-d72ko7o34eumc5di5tk37h3btbxkqfr5/spack-src/Rendering/FreeType/vtkFreeTypeTools.cxx:1251:26: note: suggested alternative: 'vtkFreeTypeToolsCleanupCounter'
                          vtkFreeTypeToolsFaceRequester,
                          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                          vtkFreeTypeToolsCleanupCounter
```

### Information on your system
```console
> spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2429-f5e6c32495
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-x86_64
* **Concretizer:** original
```
